entry.title: Auto update uv pyproject.toml dependencies
entry.summary: Unlike pip-tools, uv package manager currently doesn’t support automatically updating pyproject.toml based on the lock file. This script helps automate that process by reading the versions from uv.lock and updating your pyproject.toml accordingly.
